mapper.update: update banana_product set buy_mid=#{mid} where pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select rid, score,review, rfile, rsfile, to_char(ROUND((sysdate-rdate)*24*60)) rdate from( select rid, r.mid,r.score,review, rfile, rsfile, rdate from banana_buy_review r , banana_product p where r.pid = p.pid and p.mid =#{mid} union select rid,r.mid,r.score,review, rfile, rsfile, sdate from banana_product p , banana_sell_review r where p.pid= p.pid and p.buy_mid =#{mid}) order by rdate
select rid,r.score,review, rfile, rsfile, to_char(ROUND((sysdate-rdate)*24*60)) rdate from banana_buy_review r , banana_product p where r.pid = p.pid and p.mid =#{mid} order by rdate

select rid,score,review, rfile, rsfile, to_char(ROUND((sysdate-sdate)*24*60)) rdate from (select rid,mid,score,review, rfile, rsfile, sdate from banana_sell_review where mid =#{mid} order by sdate desc)
select mid from banana_sell_review where pid=#{pid}

select rid,r.pid, score,review, rfile, rsfile, to_char(ROUND((sysdate-rdate)*24*60)) rdate from(select * from( select rid ,r.pid, r.mid, score, review, rfile, rsfile,rdate from banana_buy_review r, banana_product p where r.pid=p.pid and r.mid=#{mid} union select rid ,r.pid, r.mid, score, review,rfile, rsfile, sdate from banana_sell_review r,banana_product p where r.pid=p.pid and p.mid=#{mid}) order by rdate desc) r , banana_product p where p.pid = r.pid

select rid,pid,m.mid,r.score,review, rfile, rsfile from banana_member m , (select rid,pid,mid,score,review, rfile, rsfile from banana_buy_review union select rid,pid,mid,score,review, rfile, rsfile from banana_sell_review )r where m.mid= r.mid and rid=#{rid}

choose.when: update banana_buy_review set review = #{review} , score=#{score} , rfile= #{rfile} , rsfile = #{rsfile} rdate =sysdate where rid=#{rid}
choose.otherwise: update banana_buy_review set review = #{review} , score=#{score} where rid=#{rid}

choose.when: update banana_sell_review set review = #{review} , score=#{score} ,rfile= #{rfile} , rsfile = #{rsfile} sdate = sysdate where rid=#{rid}
choose.otherwise: update banana_sell_review set review = #{review} , score=#{score} where rid=#{rid}
